name: Movie Listings 2 Trivia Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: "Theme-park mogul (Geoffrey Rush) offers one million dollars to any of five people who stays the night in an abandoned asylum."
questions.explanation:
House on Haunted Hill.

	This 1999 remake of the classic 1958 horror movie (which starred Vincent Price) co-starrs Taye Diggs, Peter Gallagher and Chris  Kattan.

questions.text: "Keanu Reeves is a WWII veteran who falls in love with a pregnant woman and her family while pretending to be her husband."
questions.explanation:
A Walk in the Clouds.

	This 1995 drama/romance co-starred Debra Messing as his wife and Aitana Sanchez-Gijon as the woman who pretends to be his wife.  Also co-starring Anthony Quinn and Giancarlo Giannini.

questions.text: "Townspeople mistake an amnesiac writer (Jim Carrey) for a dead soldier."
questions.explanation:
The Majestic.

	This 2001 drama starred Jim Carrey as Pete Appleton, a Hollywood screenwriter in the 1950s.  After crashing off a bridge he wakes up suffering from amnesia and is mistaken for Luke Trimble, a lost WWII soldier.

questions.text: "Neil Simon's adaptation of his Broadway play about an alcoholic actress played by Marsha Mason."
questions.explanation:
Only When I Laugh.

	This 1981 comedy/drama also co-starred Kristy McNichol, David Dukes and James Coco.

questions.text: "Fashion photographer Fred Astaire dances and romances Audrey Hepburn all over Paris."
questions.explanation:
Funny Face.

	This 1957 musical/comedy was adapted from the 1927 George Gershwin Broadway musical.  Fred Astaire plays a fashion photographer who is sent out by his boss to find a "fresh face".  He finds Audrey Hepburn who plays a bookstore clerk.

questions.text: "Young ad exec's (Tom Hanks) parents (Jackie Gleason, Eva Maria Saint) split up."
questions.explanation:
Nothing in Common.

	This 1986 comedy/drama directed by Garry Marshall shows the light and dark side of a father and son relationship.

questions.text: "A man (Nick Nolte) seeks retribution from an old parter-in-crime (Jeff Bridges)."
questions.explanation:
Simpatico.

	This 1999 crime drama was adapted from the play by Sam Shepard.  It also co-stars Sharon Stone and Albert Finney.

questions.text: "Big city homicide detective (Denzel Washington) is haunted by a fallen angel who can take over the bodies of humans and animals."
questions.explanation:
Fallen.

	This 1998 thriller also stars John Goodman as Jonesy, Denzel Washington's partner.

questions.text: "Dimwits (Steve Zahn, Jack Black) plot to rescue their friend (Jason Biggs) from a cold woman."
questions.explanation:
Saving Silverman.

	This 2001 comedy also co-starred Amanda Peet as the girl who J.D. (Black) and Warren (Zahn) think is wrong for Silverman (Biggs).

questions.text: "Philip Baker Hall is mesmerizing as a gambler of inexplicable benevolence in director Paul Thomas Anderson's standout debut."
questions.explanation:
Hard Eight.

	This 1996 drama also co-starred John C. Reilly and Gwyneth Paltow.
